scenarios.title: Independence on a Vote
scenarios.description: The Board will vote on a consulting contract for a recently departed employee (within 1 year).
scenarios.question: How should independence be handled?

options.B: Only independent Directors without ties should vote

scenarios.explanation: Independence criteria help avoid conflicts and ensure objective approval.

scenarios.title: Quorum at a Special Meeting
scenarios.description: A special meeting is called with too few Directors present to meet quorum.
scenarios.question: What should the Board do?

options.C: Adjourn and reschedule with proper quorum

scenarios.title: Officer Role Clarity
scenarios.description: The Secretary is asked to approve a bank transfer.
scenarios.question: What is the appropriate step?

options.B: Refer to signatory rules; Treasurer or authorized signers should act

scenarios.explanation: Financial authority lies with authorized signers per policy/bylaws.
